data.name: Vilomah
data.detailed_description:
"No-one knew what horrors awaited Jake inside that House of Nightmares. Only God knows what he must have been feeling on that horrific night..."

Play as Jake, a teenager working the late shift in "Sal's Pizzeria" - until he's called to deliver to the HOUSE OF NIGHTMARES! Avoid this TERRIFYING KILLER in an abandoned Farmland, filled with Challenging Puzzles, Deadly Traps and Hidden Secrets!

Try to survive and escape in this fully explorable world - heavily inspired by PS1 visuals and 80's slasher movies. Try to find all 5 endings and escape with your life! Otherwise, you might just become THE HAG'S NEW BLOODY VICTIM!

Key Features:

  • 5 Multiple Endings
  • Terrifying AI
  • Interactable World
  • Outstanding Sound Design
  • Authentic PS1 Visuals
  • Horrifying Soundtrack
  • Unique Storytelling
  • 1+ Hour Gameplay
  • Interesting Lore
  • Hidden Secrets

data.short_description: Play as Jake, a teen Pizza Delivery driver on the late shift - until things get BLOODY! Try to escape this DEMENTED Farm with your life! Features PS1, 80's VHS Graphics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3 +
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 700 Series+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of blood, gore, mutilation and body horror.
